name: KEEPER-the hunter of insect
description: Kill as many enemies as you can, upgrade your weapons and equipment using XP. Killing the queen, the game restarts with even greater difficulty. Show that you are very good finishing the phase up in the most difficult mode.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows,Vista,7,10 Processor: Intel Dual Core 2.41ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 700 MB available space
